newsitem.title: USA: Pilgrim America sets payout. [CORRECTED 21:52 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Pilgrim America sets payout. [CORRECTED 21:52 GMT]

text.p: (Corrects headline to read 'sets' as opposed to 'cuts'.)
NOTE: Full name of company is Pilgrim America Prime Rate Trust.
The company said the current monthly dividend amount was based on the 30 days of November.
